alert.note: Alert for Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:18AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dewey County through 445 AM MDT... At 417 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blackfoot, or 18 miles south of Mobridge, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Blackfoot around 435 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
